attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap proposed congestion charge for Manchester City centre as public transport system would need to undergo dramatic improvements as the current public transport would be unable to meet the new demand that would come with the congestion charge, resulting in over crowding (making public trains and busses UNSAFE)and people running late for work etc due to public transport not being able to keep up with increased demand

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/NoManchcharge/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
